Mission Failed^Maybe next time!

warning_popup_message.message: Ceres is not ready for launch

log.text: Diana spawned as a Light Cruiser
Diana spawned as a non-Light Cruiser

warning_popup_message.message: Diana must be a Light Cruiser
Diana is not ready for launch

folder_arme.name_arme: Task: Dock with Houston Outpost to receive orders

event.incoming_comms_text: All TSN ships in this sector are directed to dock at Houston Outpost immediately to receive new mission orders.
We repeat, all TSN ships in this sector are directed to dock at Houston Outpost immediately to receive new mission orders!
We repeat, all TSN ships in this sector are directed to dock at Houston Outpost immediately to receive new mission orders!

The TSN Diana recently went on a secret mission into enemy territory beyond the asteroid belt to scout out a recently discovered unstable wormhole. Unfortunately, all contact from the Diana has since been lost. Your mission is to find out what happened to her, and return her to a TSN station if possible. If not, make sure she is destroyed. We cannot risk her falling into enemy hands.

The TSN Diana recently went on a secret mission into enemy territory beyond the asteroid belt to scout out a recently discovered unstable wormhole. Unfortunately, all contact from the Diana has since been lost. Your mission is to find out what happened to her, and return her to a TSN station if possible. If not, make sure she is destroyed. We cannot risk her falling into enemy hands.

The TSN Diana recently went on a secret mission into enemy territory beyond the asteroid belt to scout out a recently discovered unstable wormhole. Unfortunately, all contact from the Diana has since been lost. Your mission is to find out what happened to her, and return her to a TSN station if possible. If not, make sure she is destroyed. We cannot risk her falling into enemy hands.

The TSN Diana recently went on a secret mission into enemy territory beyond the asteroid belt to scout out a recently discovered unstable wormhole. Unfortunately, all contact from the Diana has since been lost. Your mission is to find out what happened to her, and return her to a TSN station if possible. If not, make sure she is destroyed. We cannot risk her falling into enemy hands.

log.text: Houston Outpost destroyed before giving orders

event.incoming_comms_text: Houston Outpost was destroyed!

log.text: Did not receive missions orders in time

event.incoming_comms_text: You did not follow orders from TSN Command in time!

folder_arme.name_arme: Task: Find and report Diana signal

event.incoming_comms_text: We have detected a faint automated distress signal from the Diana, originating from the wormhole. The Diana appears to be disabled.^C = relay it to TSN Command

set_comms_button.text: Relay Distress Signal to TSN Command

event.incoming_comms_text: We have detected a faint automated distress signal from the Diana, originating from the wormhole. The Diana appears to be disabled.

event.incoming_comms_text: We have detected a faint automated distress signal from the Diana, originating from the wormhole. The Diana appears to be disabled.^C = relay it to TSN Command

set_comms_button.text: Relay Distress Signal to TSN Command

event.incoming_comms_text: We have detected a faint automated distress signal from the Diana, originating from the wormhole. The Diana appears to be disabled.

clear_comms_button.text: Relay Distress Signal to TSN Command

set_comms_button.text: Relay Distress Signal to TSN Command

event.name_arme: GM Repeat offer to relay message

clear_comms_button.text: Relay Distress Signal to TSN Command

event.incoming_comms_text: We have not yet reported the Diana's distress signal to TSN Command.^C = relay it to TSN Command

set_comms_button.text: Relay Distress Signal to TSN Command

event.warning_popup_message: We have detected a faint automated distress signal detected from TSN Diana, originating from the wormhole. The Diana appears to be disabled.

event.name_arme: Comms Message Reset or Die - Ceres
Event: TSN Command receives report via button

if_comms_button.text: Relay Distress Signal to TSN Command

log.text: TSN Command received report of Diana signal via button

clear_comms_button.text: Relay Distress Signal to TSN Command

event.incoming_comms_text: Good work. We have analyzed the signal you sent us and determined that the signal is emanating from the wormhole itself. SB01 has a prototype shuttle that can enter the wormhole. Any TSN ship larger than a Scout can dock at SB01 to pick it up. We recommend that you prepare an away team with an experienced engineer who can deal with the Diana.

event.name_arme: Event: TSN Command receives report via key

log.text: TSN Command received report of Diana signal via keypress

clear_comms_button.text: Relay Distress Signal to TSN Command

event.incoming_comms_text: Good work. We have analyzed the signal you sent us and determined that the signal is emanating from the wormhole itself. SB01 has a prototype shuttle that can enter the wormhole. Any TSN ship larger than a Scout can dock at SB01 to pick it up. We recommend that you prepare an away team with an experienced engineer who can deal with the Diana.

log.text: TSN Command received report of Diana signal via GM

clear_comms_button.text: Relay Distress Signal to TSN Command

event.incoming_comms_text: Good work. We have analyzed the signal you sent us and determined that the signal is emanating from the wormhole itself. SB01 has a prototype shuttle that can enter the wormhole. Any TSN ship larger than a Scout can dock at SB01 to pick it up. We recommend that you prepare an away team with an experienced engineer who can deal with the Diana.
The automated distress signal from TSN Diana has stopped.
The automated distress signal from TSN Diana has stopped.
The automated distress signal from TSN Diana has stopped.

folder_arme.name_arme: Task: Dock with SB01 to receive Ceres shuttle

event.name_arme: Event: Artemis docks to receive shuttle
event.incoming_comms_text: Artemis, we have installed the scout shuttle Ceres. Be advised that it is not designed for battle, so we recommend that your Away Team launch it only when you are near the wormhole. (You must select Scout as the type of Ceres in order to launch it.)

event.name_arme: Event: Intrepid docks to receive shuttle
event.incoming_comms_text: Intrepid, we have installed the scout shuttle Ceres. Be advised that it is not designed for battle, so we recommend that your Away Team launch it only when you are near the wormhole. (You must select Scout as the type of Ceres in order to launch it.)

event.name_arme: Event: Aegis docks to receive shuttle
event.incoming_comms_text: Aegis, we have installed the scout shuttle Ceres. Be advised that it is not designed for battle, so we recommend that your Away Team launch it only when you are near the wormhole. (You must select Scout as the type of Ceres in order to launch it.)
SB01 was destroyed!
You may dock with us again to be refitted with another Ceres class shuttle.
Ceres has launched from Artemis. Ceres can dock in the shuttle bay of another ship whose shields are dropped. To dock, come to range 150 and put throttle in neutral.
Ceres has launched from Intrepid. Ceres can dock in the shuttle bay of another ship whose shields are dropped. To dock, come to range 150 and put throttle in neutral.
Ceres has launched from Aegis. Ceres can dock in the shuttle bay of another ship whose shields are dropped. To dock, come to range 150 and put throttle in neutral.

warning_popup_message.message: Hit U to request docking with Artemis while within 200

disabled_event.warning_popup_message: Ceres is within docking range of Artemis.

warning_popup_message.message: Hit I to request docking with Intrepid while within 200

disabled_event.warning_popup_message: Ceres is within docking range of Artemis.

log.text: Ceres left both Artemis and Intrepid area

event.incoming_comms_text: Ceres has docked with Artemis. Ceres can be launched again at any time.
Ceres has docked with Intrepid. Ceres can be launched again at any time.
Ceres has docked with Aegis. Ceres can be launched again at any time.

warning_popup_message.message: Artemis: Gravity well hazard. Proceed cautiously.
Intrepid: Gravity well hazard. Proceed cautiously.
Aegis: Gravity well hazard. Proceed cautiously.
Ceres: Gravity well hazard. Proceed cautiously.

event.incoming_comms_text: Ceres has entered the wormhole.

warning_popup_message.message: Ceres has successfully made it through the wormhole! Gravity is normal.
Experiencing unexpected turbulence! Engaging landing gear...
Ceres has crashed on the planet surface!
External atmosphere normal. Safe to proceed outside.
Diana's signal is emanating from nearby.
TSN officer authenticated, automated distress call canceled. Accessing computer...
Classified schematic found! Accessing Captain's Log...

event.incoming_comms_text: The Diana's computer contains detailed schematics for a prototype Cetrocite device, which surely must be related to its secret mission.
S = Send a copy of the schematics to SB01 for scientific analysis

set_comms_button.text: Send schematics to SB01 for analysis

event.incoming_comms_text: I = Send a copy of the schematics to IB02 for production

set_comms_button.text: Send schematics to IB02 for production

event.incoming_comms_text: S = Send a copy of the schematics to the Cassini for scientific analysis

set_comms_button.text: Send schematics to Cassini for analysis

event.incoming_comms_text: M = Send a copy of the schematics to the Mariner for production

set_comms_button.text: Send schematics to Mariner for production

clear_comms_button.text: Send schematics to SB01 for analysis

warning_popup_message.message: Command sequence accepted. Diana is now partially operational.

event.name_arme: Transfer coolant from Ceres to Diana

warning_popup_message.message: Transferred energy and coolant from Ceres to Diana
Transferred energy and coolant from Ceres to Diana

log.text: Transferred energy from Ceres to Diana

event.name_arme: Transfer energy from Ceres to Diana

warning_popup_message.message: Power couplers are damaged. Only one system at a time is actually getting power.
Diana: Gravity well hazard. Proceed cautiously.
The Diana has successfully made it out of the wormhole!
The Diana has successfully made it out of the wormhole!
Diana: Gravity well hazard. Proceed cautiously.
The Diana has re-entered the wormhole!
The Diana has re-entered the wormhole!

event.incoming_comms_text: We have analyzed the Cetrocite device schematic from the Diana. Our research indicates that such a device might be able to attract space whales within a range of about 25k.
We have analyzed the Cetrocite device schematic from the Diana. Our research indicates that such a device might be able to attract space whales within a range of about 25k.
Since Torgoths hunt space whales, while Arvonians are outraged if they see anyone hurt one, you might be able to use the Cetrocite prototype to break up the Torgoth-Arvonian alliance in this sector!
We have completed construction of the Cetrocite device. Dock with us to have it installed.
We have completed construction of the Cetrocite device. Come to within 150m of us to have it installed.

event.name_arme: Event: Artemis docks with IB02 to receive Cetrocite device
event.incoming_comms_text: Artemis, we have installed the prototype Cetrocite device in your ship.
